actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A joint resolution to establish a select committee for the implementation of interparliamentary relations between the legislatures of the government of Iran and the government of the United States.

summary.text: Establishes a select committee on the relationship between Iran and the United States to expire on the last day of the 97th Congress.

titles.title: A joint resolution to establish a select committee for the implementation of interparliamentary relations between the legislatures of the government of Iran and the government of the United States.
